title: SoftBank races to fulfill $22.5 billion funding pledge to OpenAI by year-end
description: The 'all-in' bet on OpenAI is among the biggest yet by SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son, as he seeks to improve his firm's position in the race for artificial intelligence.
content: SoftBank Group is racing to close a $22.5 billion funding commitment to OpenAI by year-end through an array of cash-raising plans, including a sale of some investments, and could tap its undrawn margin loans borrowed against its valuable ownership in... [649 chars]

title: Stocks rise on Wall Street as AI stocks turn higher again
description: NEW YORK — Stocks gained ground on Wall Street Friday for a second straight day, wiping away losses from earlier in the week. Technology stocks were once again the main force behind the market’s broader moves, especially companies with a focus on artificial intelligence. Both the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq closed out the week […]

title: ‘Hinduism is not merely a method of worship but a complete way of life’
